message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe could be of great value to you. While I can't disclose the exact nature of the product, I assure you it's worth at least $1200000 to me. I'm willing to let it go for a price that would be mutually beneficial. Would you be interested in discussing a price of $1500000? This gives you a good deal while still ensuring I receive a fair return on my investment.
